description: Data Transfer Object (DTO) for the response after creating a game in the chess backend. Contains game ID, status, turn color, and FEN string.

classes.name: CreateGameResponse
classes.description: DTO representing the response sent after creating a game, including game ID, status, turn, and position in FEN notation.

methods.name: CreateGameResponse
methods.description: Default constructor for the CreateGameResponse class.

methods.name: CreateGameResponse
methods.description: Constructor initializing all fields: gameId, status, turn, and fen.

methods.name: getGameId
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the game.

methods.name: getTurn
methods.description: Returns which side is to move.

methods.name: getFen
methods.description: Returns the current position in FEN notation.

methods.name: setGameId
methods.description: Sets the UUID of the game.

methods.name: setFen
methods.description: Sets the FEN string representing the position.
